system.description: Defender: When you leap to defend your love or rival in battle, roll + Danger instead of + Savior to defend them.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Mark Potential and the GM makes a move.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
For NPC threats:

You Keep them safe and choose one. But it costs you: expose yourself to danger or escalate the situation.

  • add a Team to the pool
  • take Influence over someone you protect
  • clear a condition

 

For PC threats:

Give them -2 to their roll.

You Expose yourself to cost, retribution, or judgment

success.label: Success!
success.value:
For NPC threats:

You Keep them safe and choose one.

  • add a Team to the pool
  • take Influence over someone you protect
  • clear a condition

 

For PC threats:

Give them -2 to their roll.

system.choices:
• Add a Team to the pool
  • @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.PzqlHqRhI7uRWAxR]
  • @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.UQp2JmzBob2lVP3C]{Clear a Condition}
